meanings.definition: The state or condition of being adjacent.
meanings.sent1: The adjacencies of the two rooms made it easy to move between them.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the adjacencies of the houses on the street.
meanings.sent3: The adjacencies of the puzzle pieces were so perfect, it was like they were meant to fit together.
meanings.sent4: The adjacencies of the colors in the painting created a harmonious effect.
meanings.sent5: The adjacencies of the flavors in the dish complemented each other perfectly.

meanings.definition: The things that are adjacent; especially, the area or areas that are nearby.
meanings.sent1: She explored the adjacencies of the park, discovering hidden paths and beautiful gardens.
meanings.sent2: The adjacencies of the shopping mall include various stores and restaurants.
meanings.sent3: The adjacencies of the playground were filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The adjacencies of the forest whispered secrets of ancient trees and mystical creatures.
meanings.sent5: The adjacencies of the beach were alive with the sounds of crashing waves and seagulls.
